required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Post-Market Clinical Follow-up of WOVEX (Wovex® Polyester Vascular Prostheses) Bifurcated Prostheses From LEMAITRE VASCULAR Society in the Treatment of Aneurysms or Occlusive Diseases of the Abdominal Aorta.
clinical_study.official_title: Post-Market Clinical Follow-up of WOVEX (Wovex® Polyester Vascular Prostheses) Bifurcated Prostheses From LEMAITRE VASCULAR Society in the Treatment of Aneurysms or Occlusive Diseases of the Abdominal Aorta

brief_summary.textblock:
The Wovex bifurcated dacron vascular prostheses have been available on the French market since 2008. They are mainly used to treat aneurysmal or occlusive aortic diseases. To date, they have not been the subject of a specific clinical efficacy/safety study, unlike other Dacron prostheses used in the same field.
We purpose a monocentric, retrospective, consecutive study based on medical data, including all the patients operated for aneurysms or occlusive disease of the abdominal aorta at Dijon Bourgogne University Hospital between 2013 and 2017 and who received a WOVEX bifurcated prosthesis (Wovex® Polyester Vascular Protheses).
The objective is to explore the safety (short-term postoperative morbidity and mortality at 5 years) and efficacy (primary permeability, secondary permeability and dilatation of the prosthesis at 5 years) of the WOVEX prosthesis.

primary_outcome.description: Occurrence of death or major re-intervention (bypass stenosis/thrombosis, false anastomotic aneurysm, prosthesis infection, anastomosis rupture, amputation) over the entire follow-up period (from date of surgery to study end date (February 28, 2021))

secondary_outcome.description: bypass stenosis/thrombosis, false anastomotic aneurysm, prosthesis infection, anastomosis rupture, amputation throughout the follow-up period
Stenosis/thrombosis of the prosthesis over the entire follow-up period
Stenosis/thrombosis after reintervention over the entire follow-up period
Diameter of the prosthesis over the entire follow-up period
Occurence of MAVE and MACCE (re-interventions, ischemic cardiac, neurological (stroke/TIA), pulmonary and renal complications) throughout the follow-up period
Other adverse events over the entire follox-up period

clinical_study.condition: Aneurysms or Occlusive Disease of the Abdominal Aorta

arm_group.description: Patients who have undergone open abdominal aortic surgery between January 1st, 2013 and December 31, 2017 in Burgundy Dijon Hospital. Patients who have been treated with a WOVEX bifurcated prosthesis (Wovex® Polyester Vascular Protheses)

intervention.description: demographics co-morbidities risk factors operative, hospital and vascular follow-up data

study_pop.textblock: Patients operated for aneurysms or occlusive disease of the abdominal aorta at Dijon Bourgogne University Hospital between January, 1st 2013 and December 31, 2017 who received a WOVEX bifurcated prosthesis (Wovex® Polyester Vascular Protheses) from LEMAITRE VASCULAR Society

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject is volontarily agree to participation
- Patients operated for aneurysms or occlusive disease of the abdominal aorta at Dijon Bourgogne University Hospital between January, 1st 2013 and December 31, 2017 who received a WOVEX bifurcated prosthesis (Wovex® Polyester Vascular Protheses) from LEMAITRE VASCULAR Society
Exclusion Criteria:
- Deceased patients who have expressed their refusal of post-mortem processing of their personal health data
